item.title: The Second Violin
item.description: It was a long drive home, it always was. It’s always a longer drive than anyone ever hoped. No drive is really is short enough after 2 o’clock in the morning. Last time she drove this way home it was with Craig right beside her. He’d been playing third that evening. Suzie had played second violin. As she had done for a few years now. Back then, she was new to the gig and Craig always liked driving together.
